column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////5 stars for service. Our waiter Terry
column2: was funny and nice. He gave us free dessert and gave us a tour of their whiskey room. Our food came out promptly
column3: dishes cleared quickly and water refilled frequently. I gave 4 stars because of the food. We ordered shaved pork chop sandwich
column4: fries and power spinach salad. The salad was good
column5: but the sandwich had chewy bacon and slightly dry pork chop. The fries seemed to be double deep fried? The crispy layer was extra thick and overly crispy if that makes sense. Unfortunately
column6: the dessert (red velvet churros) we got was the same way with thick crunchy outer layer. I much prefer the costco churros.
